attributes.action: Stop the closure of the night owl truck stop at alconbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the closure of the night owl truck stop st alconbury near huntingdon is criminal as it is putting drivers lives in danger,there have been two highjackings on the A14 in the last month and this is the only secure parking for miles around.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/trucktheft/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
